skillTree.localised_description: Aurelion's staff is tied to the Wind of Azyr, to watch at the inside of the sphere allows her the power to see a small fraction of the future, although it requires great costs of energy to do so.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +8% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: Those who employ War Lion Chariots benefit considerably from the ferocity of the huge, snarling cats, keeping foes exposed to their cleaving weaponry.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The wild Griffons of Ulthuan are creatures of noble bearing and keen intelligence, with whom Elves form bonds that only death can shatter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Those facing a great challenge, a difficult decision, or simply in need of luck, may call upon the Goddess of Dreams and Fortune.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +8% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A potent and pale wall of flames surrounds the enemy, blinding him and slowly melting his skin away.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Learning from the High Loremaster is a invaluable gift for any elven mage, and such experience has allowed Aurelion to best older and more powerful sorcerers in battle.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -15% for all spells

related_attributes.bullet_text: When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

skillTree.localised_description: As the cousin of the Phoenix King Finubar, Aurelion had made some friends in high places across her short career, and have been granted a few gifts from the Seafarer.

In her time helping Captain Von Kessel to uncover the remaining chaos forces and cults left after the Great War across the Empire, she has learned how to identify the most subtle chaos taint on suspects, and to exterminate it swiftly.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -40%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Even though she was dismissive of the abilities of Men, and saw them as a necessary nuisance and uncomfortable allies, her time spent in the Empire and in company of Von Kessel has soften her view of them, becoming more tolerant of their existence and manners.
In the midst of battle, when facing desperate odds, a sorceress can lose control and try by all costs to get out of there alive, blasting aside ally and foe alike.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wind Blast"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind Blast Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind Blast Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The Archmage crackles and flows with energies that would unmake any mortal practitioner.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mere talent alone is not enough, one must be truly gifted to be chosen to study at the Tower of Hoeth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: With precise applications of unmaking, any threat may be rendered null and void in turn.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having finished her mission with Von Kessel, and still mourning her brother’s death, Aurelion’s future looks uncertain, but her fierce determination to fight the Dark Forces remains unchanged.
